reasoning: Hepatosplenic schistosomiasis is chronic stage of schistosomiasis mansoni/japonicum with liver/spleen involvement. Incidence ~2.5 per 100k in endemic regions; prevalence ~15 per 100k due to chronic nature. Global estimate limited; primarily endemic in Sub-Saharan Africa and parts of Middle East/Asia.
source: WHO schistosomiasis control program estimates and endemic country surveys
